title: Zombie Fever
description: Shoot, survive, and escape the zombie apocalypse!
shortDesc: Step into a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Armed with powerful weapons and quick reflexes, fight your way through zombie-infested streets to reach the last research center. Survive intense shootouts, use power-ups, rescue hostages, and stay alive in King of the Hill or Horde modes. Shoot, run, and surviveâ€”this is humanity's last stand.
roles: Spearheaded the entire game development lifecycle as a solo Unity developer, from concept to final release.
Designed and implemented core gameplay mechanics including AI behavior, shooting systems, power-ups, and mission logic.
Engineered scalable game architecture with performance optimization techniques for smooth gameplay on low-end Android devices.
Created intuitive UI/UX interfaces with responsive controls and interactive HUD elements.
Authored and integrated all visual effects, audio systems, and animation controllers to enhance player immersion.
Managed Play Store publishing process including APK build pipelines, asset compression, and release compliance.
Conducted in-depth testing, bug fixing, and performance profiling to ensure high-quality player experience.

contributions.name: Gameplay Systems
contributions.shortDesc: Designed and implemented core zombie shooter mechanics.
details: Developed dynamic zombie AI with pursuit, attack, and pathfinding behaviors.
Implemented shooting, weapon upgrades, health kits, and grenade systems.
Designed survival and mission modes including Horde and Rescue objectives.
Balanced difficulty scaling and pacing through waves and player stats.

contributions.name: Technical Development
contributions.shortDesc: Engineered all technical systems and optimized performance.
details: Built the full architecture in Unity using C# with modular design.
Implemented object pooling for performance across low-end devices.
Handled level design with enemy spawner systems and power-up triggers.
Integrated animation controllers, blend trees, and VFX for enemy deaths.

contributions.name: UI/UX & Publishing
contributions.shortDesc: Crafted the player interface and managed store publishing.
details: Created responsive UI for health, ammo, wave tracker, and pause menu.
Handled localization-ready UI and smooth screen transitions.
Published the game to Google Play with compliance and build pipeline.
Optimized asset compression and build size for APK distribution.
